help.welcome: Welcome to the EDPB website auditing tool
help.introduction:
The EDPB website auditing tool collects evidence, generates reports regarding trackers that are being used by websites. It is intended to be used to facilitate website inspections.

On this page you will find information on how to use the EDPB auditing tools. Click on How the tool works to get a first introduction.

At any time, you can come back to this page by clicking on the help button on the left sidebar.

new.start_a_new_analysis: Start a new analysis to be stored in list section.
new.select_a_source: Select a source for this scenario
new.select_a_source_help: Defines the source used to collect evidences in the analysis : the browse section of this tool, an extract of communications from a browser or evidences generated by the tool Website Evidence Collector (WEC) of the EDPS.
new.name_of_the_website: Name of the website or responsible entity.
new.name_of_the_website_help: This name helps to indentify this analysis in the list.
new.url_of_the_website_help: This url is the starting point of your analysis. Note that this url is only informational and other urls can be used while browsing.
new.import_har: Import communications from HTTP Archive format (HAR)
new.import_wec: Import evidence from Website Evidence Collector
new.set_a_tag: Set a tag for this scenario
new.set_a_tag_help: An analysis can contains multiple scenario (e.g. before consent, after consent, after refusal, etc.). This tag helps to identify a scenario amongst the analysis.

header.analysis: List of analysis to be evaluated.
header.trackers: List of known trackers with their purposes
header.knowledge: Templates can be used to format report of analysis in HTML or PDF format.
header.knowledge_sub: Refer to the section templating in help for more information about the template format.

cookie.exact_match_tooltip: The name and the domain of this cookies match entries in the knowledge base.
cookie.match_name_tooltip: The name associated to no domains (*) matches entries in the knowledge base.
cookie.match_domain_tooltip: The domain of this cookies is associated to other entries in the knowledge base.

localstorage.could_match_tooltip: The key or the script used by this local storage entries matches entries in the knowledge base.

knowledge.name: Name
knowledge.author: Author
knowledge.add_this_item: Add this item to a knowledge base

toolbar.search_input: Search or type in a URL

log_details.details_tooltip: Detailed information related to the selected line.
log_details.logs_tooltip: Script or request that stored the selected information.
log_details.knowledge_tooltip: Information from the knownledge base that could be linked to the selected line.

testssl.processing: Processing... this may take a while.

form.no_forms: No web forms submitting data without HTTPS secure communication found in the current page.
